snippet.title: Salvo Shuffle - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Salvo Shuffle is a bullet-hell deck-building roguelike with turn-based combat mechanics, similar to Undertale, and visuals similar to Just Shapes and Beats.

Each enemy can spawn an attack - called a 'Salvo' - that you need to dodge to avoid taking damage during their turn. After that, you can attack them with the items you found during your run.

After 1.5 years in development, hopefully, it will have been worth the wait.

Wishlist the game and join the discord server below!
